participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, loves to share interests with others.
participant_1.background: My mom always told me to eat my vegetables, but I never liked them. I'm afraid of losing my cats. My favorite video game is Halo 3. I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre. I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys expressing herself through fashion and hobbies.
participant_2.background: I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. My mother worked for Apple. I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance. I drive a BMW. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: How is your day going?
My day is going great! I just got home from Comic Con and I'm still in my costume.
That's awesome! I have never been to Comic Con, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go sometime! It's so much fun. I love dressing up in my favorite characters.
What's your favorite costume that you've worn?
My favorite costume is my thigh high leather boots and a skirt.
That sounds like a really cool costume! I bet you looked great in it.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
I'm kind of a nerd myself. I love video games and I'm a big fan of Halo 3.
Oh, cool! I love video games too. Halo 3 is one of my favorites.
Do you play any other games?
Yeah, I play a lot of different games. I like Call of Duty, Minecraft, and Overwatch.
Those are all great games! I play a lot of Overwatch too.
What's your favorite character?
My favorite character is Tracer. She's so fast and agile.
Tracer is a great character! I love playing her too.
It's nice to meet someone who shares my love of video games.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who is a fellow nerd.
I hope you have a great rest of your day!
Thanks! You too!
